mainText: Semero's frown deepened as he pondered wizard's demand.
talkOption: "Grandfather sent me to kill dragon," he said slowly, "He will simply put you out of door without dragon head."
talkOptionResult: Wizard's eyes narrowed. "These are already my problems," he hissed, "In meantime, deal with yours. Arvanka is only getting worse with every second of your delay."
